陽.definition: positive (electric.); sun; male principle (Taoism); Yang, opposite: 陰|阴[yin1]

陽光.definition: sunshine; (of personality) upbeat; energetic; transparent (open to public scrutiny)

陽明山.definition: Mt Yangming in Hunan; Mt Yangming in north Taiwan, near Taibei
